subject: What's happening?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
A very large apparent seismic event was recorded today at 1920Z (1:20 pm 
CST) and again at 2000Z (2:00 pm CST). The people who recorded it 
couldn't locate its source. They felt it was NOT an earthquake.

Have there been any ITC messages about this??

Zack
